item.title: Icon boxes
item.dc:creator: webman
item.content:encoded:
[box color="gray"] You can create many different type of icon boxes with the theme. The easiest solution is to use the Icon shortcode and insert it directly to section title. For more advanced stuff there are Content Modules. They can be set up as icon boxes with predefined, Retina-ready icons (you can upload and use your own set of icons if you want) or you can upload any icon image (when using appropriate icon size, they are also Retina-ready; several different icon packs are packed with the theme). Icon boxes can be set to display in default or centered layout and it is possible to set up a background color for the icons.

Your creativity is the limit here - so there is none :)

[/box] [separator_heading size="2" align="center"]Simple icons in headings[/separator_heading]   [column size="1/3"]

[separator_heading]4 columns, max 8 projects, manual scroll[/separator_heading] [projects columns="4" count="8" scroll="1"][/projects] [raw][projects columns="4" count="8" scroll="1"][/projects][/raw] [devider type="plain" space_before="40" space_after="40" /] [separator_heading]2 columns, no excerpt, description left, with filter[/separator_heading] [projects filter="1" columns="2" excerpt_length="0" order="random" align="left"]

Recent projects

[last_update item="project" /] You can use a "last_update item='project'" shortcode to display the date of most recent project addition [/projects] [raw][projects filter="1" columns="2" excerpt_length="0" order="random" align="left"]TEXT[/projects][/raw] [devider type="plain" space_before="40" space_after="40" /] [separator_heading]Automatic scroll, no images[/separator_heading] [projects columns="5" count="10" order="new" thumb="0" scroll="4000"][/projects] [raw][projects columns="5" count="10" thumb="0" scroll="4000"][/projects][/raw]  

All posts shortcode parameters

[raw][projects align="left/right" filter="0/1" columns="2/3/4/5/6" count="NUMBER" category="CATEGORY_SLUG" order="name/new/old/random" thumb="0/1" scroll="MILISECONDS" excerpt_length="NUMBER"][/projects][/raw]

"Project attributes" shortcode

In case you need to reposition project attributes list on single project pages, you can use a "project_attributes" shortcode to place it anywhere in project content or excerpt. By default the project attributes are being displayed at the beginning of project excerpts. Once you place this shortcode somewhere else the default position will not be displayed. [raw][project_attributes title="TEXT" /][/raw]

item.title: Other shortcodes
item.dc:creator: webman
item.content:encoded:
[column size="3/4"] [box color="orange" icon="info"]The whole shortcode documentation can be found directly in contextual help of the WordPress admin screens. You can also use Shortcode Generator to build and insert your shortcodes.[/box] [separator_heading]Widget areas[/separator_heading] You can use Widget Area shortcode to insert any widget area (also called "sidebar") directly to page/post content. Widgets will be aligned into columns automatically. [raw][widgets area="WIDGET_AREA_ID" style="horizontal/vertical/sidebar-left/sidebar-right" /][/raw]   [separator_heading]Access shortcodes[/separator_heading] The theme allows you to place the Login form anywhere on the website. You can also use usergroup specific shortcodes to display content to logged in users. [raw][login stay="0/1" /] [administrator]TEXT[/administrator] [author]TEXT[/author] [contributor]TEXT[/contributor] [editor]TEXT[/editor] [subscriber]TEXT[/subscriber][/raw]   [separator_heading]Screensize specific content[/separator_heading] If you want to display a specific content (maybe a message) on certain device screen size, you can use the Screen shortcode. [raw][screen size="desktop/tablet/mobile/mobile landscape/mobile portrait"]TEXT[/screen][/raw]   [separator_heading]Sections[/separator_heading] When using "Sections" page template, you need to wrap the content in Section shortcode. This shortcode will let you split the page into vertical sections and using custom CSS classes you can style these sections how you like! But remember, this shortcode works with "Sections" page template only! Also section HTML ID will be created from custom CSS (use web developer tools to check the HTML code to style the sections properly). [raw][section class="CSS_CLASS/alt" style="CSS"]TEXT[/section][/raw]   [separator_heading]Subpages[/separator_heading] Subpages shortcode will display sub- and sibling-pages (possible to display full hierarchy also with parents if displayed in a subpage). Please see right for the shortcode example output. [raw][subpages depth="0(all levels)/1/2/3/4/5" order="menu/title" parents="0/1" /][/raw] [/column] [column size="1/4 last"]

Subpages shortcode sample

[subpages depth="0" order="title" parents="1" /] [/column]

item.title: Oscar Wilde
item.dc:creator: webman
item.content:encoded: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing that is worth knowing can be taught. Oscar Wilde, CocaCola

item.title: Albert Einstein
item.dc:creator: webman
item.content:encoded: The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it. Albert Einstein, ChupaChups

item.title: Albert Einstein
item.dc:creator: webman
item.content:encoded: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex... It takes a touch of genius - and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction. Albert Einstein

item.title: Dalai Lama
item.dc:creator: webman
item.content:encoded: This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness. Dalai Lama, WordPress
